    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        public static <R extends org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpRequestBase> R prepare(R request,
                                                                   java.lang.String accessToken)
        Returns request prepared with headers required for Google OAuth.
        Parameters:
        request - Initial request
        accessToken - Access token previously obtained from Google OAuth

      • refreshRequest

        public static org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpPost refreshRequest(java.lang.String clientId,
                                                     java.lang.String clientSecret,
                                                     java.lang.String refreshToken)
        Returns request to refresh on offline access token from Google OAuth.
        Parameters:
        clientId - OAuth client ID (see Credentials in Google Dev Console)
        clientSecret - OAuth client secret
        refreshToken - Refresh token previously obtained along with offline access token.

      • refreshable

        public static <R extends org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpRequestBase> OAuthClient.Refreshable<R> refreshable(R unprepared,
                                                                                                java.lang.String accessToken,
                                                                                                java.lang.String clientId,
                                                                                                java.lang.String clientSecret,
                                                                                                java.lang.String refreshToken)
        Returns request as refreshable.
        Parameters:
        unprepared - Unprepared request ({#prepareRequest} not applied on)
        accessToken - Offline access token
        clientId - OAuth client ID (see Credentials in Google Dev Console)
        clientSecret - OAuth client secret
        refreshToken - Refresh token previously obtained along with offline access token.
        See Also:
        refreshRequest(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

      • parseRefreshResponse

        public static java.lang.String parseRefreshResponse(org.apache.http.HttpResponse response)
        Parses |response| to a refresh request. Content will be consumed and closed.
        Parameters:
        response - Response to HTTP POST
        Returns:
        Refreshed access token for Google OAuth
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if response is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if response is not successful (200)
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if response is successful but fails to parses it
        See Also:
        refreshRequest(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
